Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
              • sample.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Board
extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
    This class models the board of the tic-tac toe game. It is made up of 9 cells in a 3 * 3 matrix.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  Board.Cell
      This class represents the individual cells.

        private int computeRowIndex(double yCoordinate)
        Get the rowIndex of the clicked cell on the grid
        Parameters:
        yCoordinate - y-Coordinate of the mouse on the grid
        Returns:
        the rowindex of the cells which has the y-coordinate.

      • computeColumnIndex

        private int computeColumnIndex(double xCoordinate)
        Get the columnIndex of the clicked cell on grid
        Parameters:
        xCoordinate - x-coordinate of the mouse on the grid
        Returns:
        the column index of the cells associated with following x-coordinate.

        Parameters:
        whoseTurn - The current player
        xCoordinate - x-Coordinate of the cell on the board
        yCoordinate - y-Coordinate of the cell on the board.

        Check if the cell click is empty
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the cell clicked is empty.

      • getCellTokenAt

        Check if the cell at specific row index and column index is empty
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The row index of the cell in the grid.
        columnIndex - The column index of the cell in the grid.
